document.text:
From: " 
(USANYS)" 
To:
Cc: I 
Subject: RE: FW: U.S. v. Maxwell S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Date: Thu, 29 Apr 2021 20:50:25 +0000 
Attachments: 
2021.04.29_AJN_Order_re_GM_Sleeping_Conditions.pdf 
All, 
Judge Nathan directed us to confer with you per the attached order. Do you have time to speak tomorrow? Please 
let us know some times that work for you. 
Thanks, 
 Ori inal 
Message 
From: 
INIIMIS 
Sent: Thursday.. \ 
pril N. 2021 4: 12 I'M 
To: 
(USANYS 
WAIN.
Cc:
Subject: Re: FW: U.S. v. 
Maxwell S2 20 Cr 330 (Ai SO 
Confirming receipt. 
(USANYS)" .c:I=1.> 4/29/2021 
3:27 I'M 
Hi all, 
Attached please find a letter just filed by Maxwell's counsel regarding sleep deprivation. She asks "the Court to 
address Ms. Maxwell's sleeping conditions by directing the MDC to cease 15-minute light surveillance of Ms. 
Maxwell or justify the need for the disruptive flashlight surveillance." Judge Nathan has not yet ordered any 
response but we wanted to send this along to you. Please let us know if a call would be useful. 
Thanks, 
From: 
C 
STERNHEIM 
Sent: 
Thursday. 
April 29.2021 3:01 PM 
To: 
Cc: Christian Everdell 
Pagliuca 
Subject: U.S. v. 
Maxwell S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
;  Laura Menninger ;Jeff 
Good 
afternoon-
Attached is a courtesy copy of today's ECF fling. 
EFTA00029136

Regards-
Bobbi 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
mailto:
> 
**Covid-19 Notice: The West 19th Street office is currently closed but we continue to work remotely. 
Please use email or fax, instead of regular mail, for all correspondence during this time. 
We continue to work regular business hours throughout this situation. 
Thank you for your consideration. Our best wishes for your good health and well being. 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Stemheim that 
may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then 
delete this message. Thank you. 
EFTA00029137
